Package viewmodel

Class HomePageViewModel

java.lang.Object
viewmodel.HomePageViewModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.util.EventListener
public class HomePageViewModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.beans.PropertyChangeListener
This class is used to let a controller communicate with the model manager.
Version:
1.0.0 2021
Author:
Group8-SEP2

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    HomePageViewModel​(Model model)
    One-argument constructor.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addUser​(User user)
    The method is used to add an User object in the User list, an user with the same username as an already existing user will not be accepted.
    javafx.collections.ObservableList<Message> getMessages()
    Getter for the messages list.
    javafx.collections.ObservableList<Offer> getOffers()
    Getter for the offers list.
    javafx.collections.ObservableList<Offer> getOffersFromModel()
    This method returns the list of the offers from the model.
    javafx.collections.ObservableList<User> getOnlineUsers()
    Getter for the online users list.
    javafx.collections.ObservableList<User> getOnlineUsersFromModel()
    This method returns the list of the online users from the model.
    void propertyChange​(java.beans.PropertyChangeEvent evt)
    Method called whenever a change in the properties of the model happens, because this ViewModel is its listener.
    void updateLists()
    Method that updates the lists in the model (getting them from the server) and that passes these lists in the viewModel.
    void updateMessageList()
    This method updates the message list and gets a copy from the user profile.

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • updateLists

      public void updateLists()
      Method that updates the lists in the model (getting them from the server) and that passes these lists in the viewModel.

    • addUser

      public void addUser​(User user)
      The method is used to add an User object in the User list, an user with the same username as an already existing user will not be accepted.
      Parameters:
      user - The User object to be added to the list.

    • updateMessageList

      public void updateMessageList()
      This method updates the message list and gets a copy from the user profile.

    • getOnlineUsersFromModel

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<User> getOnlineUsersFromModel()
      This method returns the list of the online users from the model.
      Returns:
      An ObservableList of User objects.

    • getOffersFromModel

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<Offer> getOffersFromModel()
      This method returns the list of the offers from the model.
      Returns:
      An ObservableList of the Offer objects.
